summary: maybe controversial but isnt Beau just Sokka? Like: -i dont have magic like yall but i will punch -blue robes and a sash -snazzy...
body:
maybe controversial but isnt Beau just Sokka?

Like:

-i dont have magic like yall but i will punch

-blue robes and a sash

-snazzy undercut

-takes a liking to an awkward traumatised fire boy and wants to help him fix his issues

-i love

-seems kinda dumb at first but then you realise how amazing they are

blog.name: blackestglass
blog.title: Obsidian Musings
blog.description:
Bless you, if you've made it here. This blog is a multifandom mess. Fandoms include Critical Role, Hamilton, MCU, Pacific Rim, Elementary, Brooklyn Nine Nine, LotR, Firefly, Harry Potter, Sailor Moon, K-Pop, and many others.  I post A LOT of cute animals and babies, pictures of unfairly attractive celebrities, social justice posts, and pretty things that catch my eye. I REALLY like puns. On Wednesdays, I do No White Dude Wednesdays (NWDW) where I spam my dash with pictures and historical posts of POCs and transgender people. Occasionally, I commit podfic.
Also, I apparently do fanfiction now.
I am also on Twitter.

summary: we're all rose-colored too [Podfic] - blackglass, the24thkey - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: we're all rose-colored too [Podfic] - blackglass, the24thkey - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Title: we’re all rose-colored too
Author: thismagichour
Reader: blackglass
Rating: T
Fandom: Critical Role
Pairings: Jester Lavorre/Caleb Widogast
Summary: When Jester and Caleb are attacked and alone, they must rely on each other for comfort. Some of them are better at it than others.

For the prompt “Loss of Sight for Jester/Caleb” for Bad Things Happen Bingo!
Length: 11:20
Download: Right click and save as a LQ mp3 (for storage considerations) or as a HQ mp3. (Thanks to paraka for hosting!)

Streaming available at the link!

Notes: Thank you so much to the24thkey for reading Caleb for me when I was like, “I REQUIRE A GERMAN,” even though she doesn’t know anything about Critical Role. And thanks to @calebwidogasts for giving me permission to record their story!

blog.name: we-are-rogue
blog.title: we are Rogue
blog.description:
Gallery | D&D | Fiction | Theory | Practice | Iconic | Tags and Masterposts

Inspiration and resources for Rogues, the most resourceful player class and fantasy archetype of them all.

Jacks of all trades and masters of none, thieves, outlaws, rascals, scoundrels, pickpockets, cutpurses, cat burglars, bandits, con artists, assassins, infiltrators, highwaymen, spies, swashbucklers, smugglers, pirates, thugs, jesters, tricksters, skillmonkeys, specialists, factotums, and the occasional ronin: we are ROGUE.

summary: Vox Machina Clip ID
title: Vox Machina Clip ID
body: Hey critters, I need your help. There’s a moment in Campaign 1 where the gang are all in Whitestone when a travelling merchants’ caravan comes in (i think it’s in Whitestone?) and Keyleth grabs whoever’s next to her (Percival?) and screams “YOU GUYS iT’S A fARMERS MARKET” with an incredible intensity, and I really need that energy in my life right now. What episode is that?

reblog.comment: Hey critters, I need your help. There’s a moment in Campaign 1 where the gang are all in Whitestone when a travelling merchants’ caravan comes in (i think it’s in Whitestone?) and Keyleth grabs whoever’s next to her (Percival?) and screams “YOU GUYS iT’S A fARMERS MARKET” with an incredible intensity, and I really need that energy in my life right now. tags: also....now i want to know about the tomb takers and their group dynamic
because it sounds like my JAM
(plus of course the fact that both as lucian and as mollymauk he apparently just. collects found families)
(...i wish we knew more so i could make weird blood magic family headcanons)
summary: Despite the fact that I don’t trust Cree with their blood at all and I have no actual idea about her intentions or history,...
body: Despite the fact that I don’t trust Cree with their blood at all and I have no actual idea about her intentions or history, listening back to episode 14 she’s just so….weirdly adorable? She’s so happy (apparently on a personal level as well as For The Cause or whatever) to see “Lucian” and find out he’s alive, and later she’s so broken up about his death. She refers to the Tomb Takers - from what we know, a bloodhunter cult of generally shady characters practicing weird experimental death magic together - as a family. She canonically purrs. Just….I don’t know what’s going to happen in future but she seems like a sweetheart and I love her

summary: (about veth on her wedding day) the first time i thought of veth and yeza's wedding i imaged veth in a yellow dress with white...
question: (about veth on her wedding day) the first time i thought of veth and yeza's wedding i imaged veth in a yellow dress with white flowers in her hair and her bouquet and idk why but it just feels right to me
answer: Thanks for the ideas!! I used the yellow dress and changed it a little so she’d have a flower crown.yeza has her bouquet. It’s a simple flower but it’s was the first one yeza gave to her when they were younger.

blog.name: twinvax
blog.description: I write and reblog things for my fandoms. Main focus Critical Role. Feel free to send me asks or general headcanons about characters! I have a critical role rp blog! made and role played for Yeza the halfling (chemistyeza.tumblr.com). Asks open!

summary: In an au where Caleb never broke and Trent takes on Veth as a new promising alchemic student, he would also bring in Yeza and...
body:
In an au where Caleb never broke and Trent takes on Veth as a new promising alchemic student, he would also bring in Yeza and have Astrid mentor him. 

Trent always takes more than one kid, and Yeza learns more potent poisons and acids under Astrid. 

Veth and Bren work on alchemy that results in more dramatic changes, and also teaches Veth wizard magic to expand her repertoire. 

It’s a bit threatening. a 24 and a 16 year old should not be as dangerous or as powerful as they are, and yet.

reblog.comment:

tags: also agdjdjdh its very nice to meet you!!!
i really hope youre enjoying cr!!!
summary: Just a funny thing I thought I'd share, but, I've been following you for awhile, and I've been catching up on critrole2 for...
question: Just a funny thing I thought I'd share, but, I've been following you for awhile, and I've been catching up on critrole2 for about two months, and I *finally* got to meet Caduceus and.... So, this whole time, in my head, I've been thinking it like K - I- uh- Day- sh- (soft e)- oos, and I don't even know *why*, but, man, was I freakin' *surprised*.
answer: Oh man I’m so so glad you’ve gotten to meet the funky cow man and YEAH he’s got a WILD name but considering it comes from a man named Taliesin Axelrod Jaffee, it’s…….pretty tame

reblog.comment: Oh man I’m so so glad you’ve gotten to meet the funky cow man and YEAH he’s got a WILD name but considering it comes from a man named Taliesin Axelrod Jaffee, it’s…….pretty tame
